title: How I feel about all the Christmas/Holiday stuff people are talking about in my life.
body:
http://66.media.tumblr.com/e8d6a136612feca7eb16efe25b67a131/tumblr_og7c4pgNsa1tof9kfo8_1280.png

I know thanksgiving doesn't sell well for big corporations, but can I at least enjoy my fall leaves without seeing Happy Holidays?!

 #LET ME ENJOY THE DECAY!

replies.body:
XMAS > TURKEY DAY

WHO'S WITH ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Christmas needs to chill. Seriously, stores start putting up Christmas decorations before they take down Halloween ones. 

It's gotten to the point where I'm starting to not like Christmas because of people trying to rush it.
This, I was at a supermarket on Nov. 1st, and I kid you not they were playing Christmas music. I recognized the "Mr. Grinch" song and thought "surely not... Halloween was yesterday :[ "
Try working at these places. From Nov 1st to like...the middle of January it nothing BUT these crappy holiday songs.
I wish you the best of luck in retaining your sanity.
It sucks. The songs get infuriating after a while. But hey, better than the usual pop garbage.
This is why I listen to jpop, I may not understand the lyrics but music is universal
Japanese anime openings in a nutshell.
I rather listen to the pop garbage then listen to a rap version of Frosty the snowman...followed by a country version of Frosty. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
They're both awful, to be honest.

I didn't know they had different versions. 

What fresh hell is this?

I prefer the original ones because Nostalgia from those comfortable elementary school days.

Now they ruin it with people singing seductively about reindeers with red noses.

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/173/576/Wat8.jpg?1315930535

I mean...I've been having problems getting into the holiday spirit ever since I stopped caring about Halloween, but I can't imagine people caring a lot about holidays with that shit!

God it's like the nuclear family dynamic and a lot of the values aimed at baby boomers and their kids are finally crashing-Oh yeah. 

I almost forgot how our culture is kinda like a sinking ship right now.
I probably would snap and hack the PA to play Beatles mid-November.
#I know right?!

I was expecting something more like this:

http://youtu.be/w9tWsfQiTQE

Although, personally, I can't wait for Summoner's Rift to get snowy, then I'll have holiday yordles for every position.

Because it'll be around Christmas, I can finally get Ragdoll Poppy to finish my collection and have one for top/jungle. Bad Santa Veigar for mid. Earnest Elf Tristana for ADC. And Winter Wonder Lulu for support. Yes, I can lock in as fill and always have a Christmas skin!

EDIT: Okay, so if I lock in fill, I'm always going to use Winter Wonder Lulu because I'll always wind up support.
Snow Rift is exciting as hell right now!  Can't wait!

I thought you would be disappointed they don't have any Christmas Sion skins.

I know I'm disappointed they don't have a 1820 Poppy skin and the rest of her skins are all legacy. I guess it's a good thing my next tier champions aren't Corki and Twitch, the legacy skin count would be absurd.
I think he could get a santa Sion skin
{{champion:14}}: "**COWARDS**- I mean, uh. **HO, HO, HO!**
#GIVE SION A SLEIGH WITH FAT REINDEERS WHEN HE ULTS
Only if sion is literally holding the sleigh and running while dragging the reindeers behind.
He can use a sleigh instead of an axe :^)
I was thinking a Christmas tree or a bloodied candy cane.
Or some christmas bells on a stick. That could have some funny SFX with his Q
#Ding DONG!

There's is so much potential for a recall aswell.
Sion taking milk and cookies, first eating the cookies and then eating the milk. Including the glass.
He can use a _slay_ instead of an axe.

...
Get out.
And have him yell "Ho, ho, ho, hoes!"

I take it personally because I was born on Thanksgiving.

#TurkeyLivesMatter
i saw some christmas decorations going up mid October... was like "it hasn't even been halloween yet and you're already putting up christmas lights??"
Give the turkey it's chance to shine Christmas, jeez.
Last year I saw Christmas decorations before Halloween, it was pretty bad.  There were still decorations up in the middle of spring too.  At this point Christmas isn't a holiday, it is half a year.
Truly, Thanksgiving is the best holiday!
I love Christmas
I also love Christmas.  **IN DECEMBER!**
Up in Canada we have Halloween decorations up in august
Are you all just starved for holidays up there?
Yeah... the only 2 holidays we have up here that are left for the year are remembrance day and christmas

> LET ME ENJOY THE DECAY!

I'm stealing this 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}*upvote*

Expecting thanksgiving?

TO BAD WALUIGI CLAUS TIME
